content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal views or opinions. However, regarding Iran's position on Israel, while there have been some moments of detente between Iran and Israel in the past, such as during the presidency of Mohammad Khatami, it is unlikely that Iran's position will change drastically in the near future, especially as long as the political and religious leadership of Iran remain the same. Iranian officials have repeatedly stated their opposition to the Israeli government and policies, and have called for the liberation of Palestine from Israeli occupation.
